name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: The L.A. Clippers have been sold. Yes, I also don't really care. Everyone is like, "Oh, OK."

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: The Clippers have been sold for $2 billion. That got your attention.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Donald Sterling paid only $12 million to buy the Clippers. This deal is very uncomfortable for the former owner because it puts him in the black.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: President Obama had lunch today with Hillary Clinton. Hillary told the president, "After phoning my top advisers, I think I'll run for office." And the president said, "I know. I listened in."

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: A lot of people in Washington were shocked by this Obama-Hillary meeting. I'm not sure about Nancy Pelosi. She looks shocked all the time.
